name: Smart Business Diplomacy
membership: Hanna Zvolikevych, Executive director of SBD, acts as representative of the Ukrainian private energy company DTEK and works closely with Euracoal, Eurelectric, EFET
goal: The activities of the company are to provide the services on representing the interest of the foreign companies at the international organizations and at the international events in Brussels, in the European Union institutions with the aim to establish and develop the networking with the European Union institutions, industrial associations, businesses on behalf of such foreign companies.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Energy Union package, security of supply (electricity and gas), follow-up of COPs and Paris agreement, Energy Community, renewables, energy efficiency, new energy market design, EU Neighbourhood policy, environment policy and regulation, Clean Energy for All Europeans Package; CESEC initiative; sustainable finance; CRiTP; grids development TYNDP and vision till 2040.
